Spaces…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Organise your Trading space today. Customise your own dashboard and take action when the right market signal appears.

Spaces allows you to multitask in multiple apps simultaneously. Set the size and desktop position for any app window and save the layout without wasting time on resizing and arranging windows by hand.

You can customise the location and appearance of the apps on your screen:
 - Your broker
 - Twitter stream
 - Slack channel
 - Reddit feed

Create your trading space how you want it and stay focused on what’s important. Organise the tools and data you need with just a glance so that you can take action when the right market signal appears.
